name: The Descent of the Patriarch
author: Yin Tianxia
content: Wudang Mountain, the sacred place of Taoism, is divided into internal and external. It inherits the highest classics of the Great Daoshu. Xie Luo, a modern Taoist, was trained in the heavenly book when he was young. In one fell swoop, he was the best in the northern Quan Zhen, the southern sect of Longhu Shan, the eastern sect, and the western sect of Shushan.
